page.title: 05A Day in the Life of Lisa
page.content: I get up at 7.45am go into the kitchen and fetch my breakfast which consists of a cup of tea and some toast.Then I go into the living room to watch "Breakfast television"a news programme .I go into the bathroom to clean my teeth and have a wash. I get dressed in my school uniform ready to go to school. I go to school in my fathers car. School starts at 9.00am. We have a religious assembly at 9.10. Then we do handwriting and write our daily dozen, which is writing about everyday news and events. We also do maths,history and geography. At 10.30 we have playtime and we play all sorts of games. In the afternoon we do science, {Continues on page 6
